results.content: Looking for a beginner's course to advancing your knowledge in JS. Then this is the perfect course. The lectures build on each other and the author breaks down each of the topics with demonstrations and explanations that a beginner can understand. I have done courses on udemy in the past that left me with more questions than answers, and I have to say this is the first one that has given me clarity in not only learning JS but in understanding what I am learning and how the concepts are implemented.
